item.title: The Book of Bitcoin - An Analogy to Explain Bitcoin
item.description: This was a project for my speech and debate class, the sources are in the video’s description. Here’s the video version of the speech: Here’s the transcript of the speech: What do you think of when you hear the word “Bitcoin”? According to a 2017 YouGov survey, 62% of Americans believe that cryptocurrencies, like Bitcoin, are used for illegal purchases or don’t know what they’re used for at all.
